# Sea Turtle Conservation Project

## About
This is the official website for Sea Turtle Conservation, dedicated to protecting sea turtles and their habitats through education, rescue operations, and community engagement.

## Content Overview
- /about: Mission, Vision, and Team information.
- /services: Our conservation programs and educational workshops.
- /gallery: Video and image gallery of our work.
- /donation: Support our cause with tiered donations.
- /contact: Get in touch or volunteer.
- /blog: Educational articles on turtle ecology and protection.

## Technical Details
- Built with Next.js 14 and Tailwind CSS.
- Uses Framer Motion for animations.
- Responsive design for all devices.
